## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/record">Record</a> a link in the Narrow IV def-use chain along with the WideIV that computes the same value as the Narrow IV def.

This avoids caching Use&#42; pointers.

Definition at line 1115 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/simplifyindvar-cpp">SimplifyIndVar.cpp</a>.
